description: This file is an HTML document that provides the front-end interface for a database viewer in a web application. It includes HTML structure, CSS styles for layout and design, and JavaScript for dynamic interactions such as fetching database information, tables, and data, as well as rendering tables and handling user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show or hide its tables, loading tables on demand.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and renders data for a selected table, displaying it in a tabular format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML to display a dataset in table form, handling wide content.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for readability.
